markdown: <::attestation: Signature/Handwritten name Signature: legible Readable Text: SABRY A handwritten name, centrally located::> 10/81 CURRICULUM VITA Z.I. Sabry Director, Food Policy and Nutrition Division Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations Via delle Terme di Caracalla 00100 Rome, Italy Telephone: 06-57973330 General Information Date and Place of Birth: 16 August 1932, Egypt Sex: Male Marital Status: Separated Citizenship: Canadian Height: 165 cm (5'6") Weight: 59 kg (130 lb.) Children: Two Education B.Sc. Food Technology (Ain Shamse University, Cairo, Egypt) 1952 M.Sc. Food Technology (University of Massachusetts, Amherst, Massachusetts) 1954 Ph.D. Biochemistry (Pennsylvania State University, University Park, Pennsylvania) 1957 Societies Canadian Institute of Food Science and Technology The Nutrition Society of Canada American Institute of Nutrition The Nutrition Society American Association for the Advancement of Science Gamma Sigma Delta (Honorary Agriculture) Phi Lambda Upsilon (Honorary Chemistry) Sigma Xi (Honorary Science) Experience 1957 - 1961 Assistant Professor, Division of Food Technology American University of Beirut, Lebanon 1961 - 1962 NRC Postdoctoral Fellow, Nutrition Division, Food and Drug Laboratories, Ottawa, Canada 1962 - 1964 Associate Professor and Head, Division of Food Technology and Nutrition, American University of Beirut, Lebanon 1964 - 1969 Associate Professor, Department of Nutrition, School of Hygiene, University of Toronto, Canada
